SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.main

Class Factories

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.main.Factories
public class Factories extends Object
Factories for pluggable components.

This is a factories container for extensible components.

You may write a plugin to inject yours.

See Also:
  • Plugin

  • Field Details

    • log

      private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger log

    • behaviour

      private static Callable<Behaviour> behaviour
      SMTP client behaviour.

      The logic of the client.

    • session

      private static Callable<Session> session
      Session.

      Used by both client and server.

    • tlsSocket

      private static Callable<TLSSocket> tlsSocket
      TLS socket implementation.

      Implements TLS handshake.

    • trustManager

      private static Callable<X509TrustManager> trustManager
      Trust manager implementation.

      Implements javax.net.ssl.X509TrustManager.

    • database

      private static Callable<DigestCache> database
      Digest MD5 database.

      Only used for subsequent authentication.

    • queueDatabase

      private static Callable<QueueDatabase<RelaySession>> queueDatabase
      Queue database implementation.

      Used for persistent queue storage.

    • storageClient

      private static Callable<StorageClient> storageClient
      MTA storage client.

      Used to store MTA emails received.

    • storageProcessors

      private static final List<Callable<StorageProcessor>> storageProcessors
      MTA storage processors.

      Used to do post receipt processing like virus and spam scanning or dovecot LDA delivery.

    • externalClients

      private static final Map<String,Callable<ExternalClient>> externalClients
      External clients.

      Used to fetch external service logs for assertion.
